description: This file declares the exported API functions for the Slap Loam Broker component within the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP). It includes function prototypes for creating, removing, enrolling, and initializing the Loam Broker object, and contains licensing and copyright information.

methods.name: SlapCreateLoamBroker
methods.description: Creates a new instance of the Loam Broker object with specified context handles.

methods.name: SlapLboCreate
methods.description: Creates a new Loam Broker object with specified context handles.

methods.name: SlapLboEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects for the Loam Broker.
